name: PhaseV
description:
PhaseV is a game about choice and consequences and a lot of clicking.

In adventure mode, you play a mothership hunting spacelets for currency.  There are five short rounds of variable difficulty in which you click away trying to keep your combo meter maxd out  and your ship up and running. Each spacelets and ennemy are randomly round generated meaning you will not get the same combination twice per round. 

Pass by Mittens Galatic Emporium to acquire spaceship upgrades, round upgrades or new spacelets. If you don't have enough currency, consider visiting the challenge mode and test your abilities. Be wary, each unlocked spacelets are a bit wackier and offer a positive and a negative impact during your adventure mode increasing or decreasing the difficulty.

You can toggle on and off unlocks in order to pick your favorite combination to help you beat PhaseV and also reach a higher score.

Available now free NYOP.

This game was created by myself Joey Russo with the usage of Gamemaker Studio.

Enjoy and if you like, please leave a comment and tell your friends. If you really like it, consider donating. 

Thank you for visiting.
